1 // Publisher node to accept Input image and Haar Cascade Data and the perform OpenCV detection and publish to camera/image
2 #include <ros/ros.h>
3 //image_transport/image_transport.h includes everything we need to publish and subscribe to images.
4 #include <image_transport/image_transport.h>
5 #include <opencv2/highgui/highgui.hpp>
6 #include <cv_bridge/cv_bridge.h>
7 #include <opencv2/objdetect/objdetect.hpp>
8 #include <opencv2/objdetect/objdetect.hpp>
9 #include <opencv2/imgproc/imgproc.hpp>
10 
11 #include <iostream>
12 #include <cstdio>
13 #include <vector>
14 #include <algorithm>
15 
16 using namespace std;
17 using namespace cv;
18 
19 
20 int main(int argc, char** argv)
21 {
22  ros::init(argc, argv, "image_publisher");
23  ros::NodeHandle nh;
24  image_transport::ImageTransport it(nh);
25  image_transport::Publisher pub = it.advertise("camera/image", 1);
26  cv::Mat image = cv::imread(argv[1], CV_LOAD_IMAGE_COLOR);
27  cv::waitKey(30);
28 
29 
30 void detectFaces(Mat&, vector<Rect_<int> >&, string);
31 void detectFacialFeaures(Mat&, const vector<Rect_<int> >);
32 
33 string input_image_path;
34 string face_cascade_path;
35 
36 
37  input_image_path = argv[1];
38  face_cascade_path = argv[2];
39 
40 
41  // Load image and cascade classifier files
42  Mat image1;
43  image1 = imread(input_image_path);
44 
45  // Detect faces and facial features
46  vector<Rect_<int> > faces;
47  detectFaces(image1, faces, face_cascade_path);
48  detectFacialFeaures(image1, faces);
49 
50  imshow("Result", image1);
51 
52  waitKey(0);
53  return 0;
54 
55 sensor_msgs::ImagePtr msg = cv_bridge::CvImage(std_msgs::Header(), "bgr8", image1).toImageMsg();
56 
57  ros::Rate loop_rate(5);
58 
59 while (nh.ok())
60 {
61  pub.publish(msg);
62  ros::spinOnce();
63  loop_rate.sleep();
64 }
65 }
66 
67 void detectFaces(Mat& img, vector<Rect_<int> >& faces, string cascade_path)
68 {
69  CascadeClassifier face_cascade;
70  face_cascade.load(cascade_path);
71 
72  face_cascade.detectMultiScale(img, faces, 1.15, 3, 0|CASCADE_SCALE_IMAGE, Size(30, 30));
73  return;
74 }
75 
76 void detectFacialFeaures(Mat& img, const vector<Rect_<int> > faces)
77 {
78  for(unsigned int i = 0; i < faces.size(); ++i)
79  {
80  // Mark the bounding box enclosing the face
81  Rect face = faces[i];
82  rectangle(img, Point(face.x, face.y), Point(face.x+face.width, face.y+face.height),
83  Scalar(255, 0, 0), 1, 4);
84  }
85 
86  return;
87 }
